This app was created for the book lovers in otder to manage more easily their lectures. The users can add their readen book or can save details of a wish book that intent to read. Also, the users have the possibility to find a book and see more details regarding this. Using 'Statistics' button from the menu, the users can see a series of charts in order to reflect their activity. 
 
 The app was developed by Marina Serbanoiu and can be used on devices that have Android 8 or more.
